Partners: KPN, Odido, VodafoneZiggo, TU Delft, TU Eindhoven, NXP, ASML
Description: Dutch National Growth Fund program focusing on intelligent 6G components, networks, and applications like smart grids and mobility.

Partners: TU Berlin, HUB, various German universities
Description: German Research and Innovation Cluster developing scientific foundations for 6G radio access and optical transport.
German hub focusing on human-machine collaboration, tactile internet, and creating 6G startups.
German industrial lighthouse project for 6G access, network of networks, and automation.

Partners: TU Kaiserslautern, various German research institutes
Description: German hub connecting AI with 6G network architectures and social sustainability.
German project developing 3D network architecture integrating ground stations, flying platforms, and satellites.

Partners: Nokia, VTT, Aalto University, Tampere University
Description: Finland's broad ecosystem program for wireless connectivity, edge intelligence, and 6G services.

Partners: TIM, Open Fiber, Leonardo, CNR, Politecnico di Milano
Description: Italian National Recovery Plan (PNRR) program revitalizing the national telecommunications R&D sector.
French national acceleration strategy funding upstream research in 5G/6G hardware and software.

Partners: University of Bristol, various UK universities
Description: UK EPSRC hub designing a seamless, open, and fully integrated 'network of networks'.

Partners: Imperial College London, various UK universities
Description: UK EPSRC hub researching all-spectrum connectivity (low frequency to THz and optical).

Partners: University of Glasgow, various UK universities
Description: UK EPSRC hub focusing on cloud, distributed computing, and AI-driven telecoms.

Partners: Infineon, AVL, AT&S, TDK, TU Graz
Description: Austrian project researching sub-THz hardware, integrated sensing (ISAC), and radar convergence.

Partners: i2CAT, UPV, CTTC, various Spanish universities
Description: Spanish national funding to build R&D infrastructure and attract talent for 6G and advanced 5G.
Flemish government-backed pilot line for advanced semiconductor packaging and sub-THz 6G chips.
Portuguese national project developing frameworks for multi-architecture 6G internet.
